hero.tagline:
Build as you think.
Talk to your IDE and watch it create.
hero.description: AI-powered IDE with Talk-to-Code Engine, video generation, game development environment, multi-agent AI, anti-hallucination system, persistent memory, offline architecture, multi-repo workspaces, AI assistant, refactoring, team collaboration & enterprise features.

talk_to_code.title: Talk‚Äëto‚ÄëCode Engine
talk_to_code.description: Describe features in plain English. Paid versions scaffold files, wire modules, and commit clean diffs.

video_generation.title: AI Video Generation
video_generation.description: Generate code documentation videos, tutorials, and presentations directly from your codebase using advanced AI models.

game_development.title: Game Dev Environment
game_development.description: All-in-one game development suite with asset management, scene editors, physics simulation, and multi-platform deployment.

multi_agent.title: Multi‚ÄëAgent AI System
multi_agent.description: Collaborate with specialized AI agents for architecture, testing, documentation, optimization, and code review.

anti_hallucination.title: Anti‚ÄëHallucination System
anti_hallucination.description: Advanced verification and validation system ensures AI-generated code is accurate, functional, and follows best practices.

persistent_memory.title: Persistent Memory
persistent_memory.description: AI remembers your coding patterns, preferences, and project context across sessions for truly personalized development experience.

offline_first.title: Offline‚ÄëFirst
offline_first.description: Runs locally. Keep your code private while unlocking AI superpowers.

one_time_license.title: One‚ÄëTime License
one_time_license.description: Buy once, keep building. Optional add-ons for teams and enterprises.

roadmap.title: CoderOne IDE Roadmap
items: Q3 2025: Lite version public launch (AI-assisted coding, basic video generation)
Q4 2025: Team version with collaborative projects and multi-agent AI
Q1 2026: Full IDE with enterprise integrations and game development suite
Q2 2026: Advanced video generation, persistent memory, and plugin marketplace
Q3 2026: Complete anti-hallucination system and offline AI model support
Ongoing: Continuous updates and new features based on user feedback
